app: 海康威视SPON IP网络对讲广播系统
seo: 海康威视,SPON,IP网络对讲广播系统,信息泄露,漏洞检测
seo_en: Hikvision,SPON,IP network intercom broadcast system,information leakage,vulnerability detection
summary: 检测海康威视SPON IP网络对讲广播系统是否存在index信息泄露漏洞，可能泄露敏感信息如用户名和密码。
summary_en: Detect whether the Hikvision SPON IP Network Intercom Broadcast System has an index information leakage vulnerability, which may expose sensitive information such as usernames and passwords.
